DOC.HEADLINE: NATION IN BRIEF ; NEW YORK ; COURT REJECTS CORDON AT ABORTION CLINIC
DOC.TEXT: A federal_court ruled that a buffer zone to protect a Buffalo , N.Y. , abortion clinic from protesters was an unconstitutional restriction on free speech . In the ruling , the U.S. 2nd Circuit Court of Appeals said the 15-foot protective zone around the clinic , included in a federal_court injunction against abortion protesters from Project Rescue , was too restrictive and thus violated the protesters ' rights . The ruling comes two months after the U.S. Supreme Court approved a 36-foot sanctuary around a Melbourne , Fla. , clinic .
